name: Spooky Chase (itch)
description:
A game where you, are your worst enemy!

You are a blissful child taking part in a capture the flag championship in exchange for treats, until something terrifying starts to happen ...

No matter how much you run, monsters chase after you mimicking your every move!

Grab the flags, escape the monsters and find out what's behind this great mystery!

Our game has 4 stages, endless mode and many skins, we need your help to complete development of four additional stages, couch multiplayer mode and, if possible, current and next-generation console ports

The target lauch date is OCT/2020

Endless Mode:
